Review of SpaceX achievements in 2023 and plans for 2024+

entry.summary:
Funny you should mention “properly-run” social networks. Are you aware that Mark Zuckerberg, presumably a “proper-runner” of social networks, funded illegal voting vans in the last election? https://fox59.com/news/national-world/ap-us-news/ap-wisconsin-judge-rules-that-absentee-voting-van-used-in-2022-was-illegal/amp/
Yann LeCun: You know Elon, properly-run social networks do their best to take down misinformation about elections.

entry.title: RT Linda Yaccarino: X became the very pulse of the entire conversation @CES!
entry.summary:
RT Linda Yaccarino X became the very pulse of the entire conversation @CES!
Data: Over 320,000 people posted about #CES this week, generating 300 million impressions, nearly 2.5 million likes, and over 65 million video views in just 4 days. These metrics are up over 100% year-over-year.
